title: Russian court rules to block access to Telegram messenger: TASS
text:
April 13, 2018 / 9:19 AM / Updated 42 minutes ago Russian court rules to block access to Telegram messenger: TASS Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MOSCOW (Reuters) - A Russian court ordered on Friday that access to the Telegram messenger service should be blocked in Russia, state-run TASS news agency reported. Two men pose with smartphones in front of a screen showing the Telegram logos in this picture illustration taken November 18, 2015. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Files 
Russia’s state communications watchdog said last week it had filed a lawsuit to limit access to the Telegram messaging app after the company refused to give Russian state security services access to its users’ secret messages. Reporting by Denis Pinchuk; Writing by Andrey Ostroukh
